item.description:
A Three hour tour on the Westport River, Westport MA. $49. Price includes kayak, safety equipment, instruction and tour through the river. And a PBJ from Roger if you REALLY want one (you can thank Judy for that) Fluff cost extra!

Update – We had to change the time to 11 am because of the tides. Also, we need 4 definites to reserve the trip and each attendee needs to make a 50% deposit by Wednesday October 29th . You can call them to make the reservation – 508-636-0300

Hosted by Osprey Sea Kayak Adventures

Based in Westport, Massachusetts, they are located at the Head of the East Branch of the Westport River. The Westport River is known for its picturesque rural landscape, easy paddling, and great birding (we have New England's largest concentration of breeding ospreys). They're located within minutes of pristine salt marshes, protected bays and harbors, and the open waters and waves of Buzzards Bay and The Elizabeth Islands.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the one in pink tights! It will be a small group - no problem finding us

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: 3 Hour Kayak Tour of the Wesport River
